title: Studying at home and in a library

content.question: You will be asked to write in Japanese for a specific purpose and a specific audience. You should write in as complete a manner as possible, taking into account the purpose and the audience described. Type your response in the target language. You are writing an article for the student newspaper of your sister school in Japan. Write an article in which you compare and contrast studying at home and studying in a library. Based on your personal experience, describe at least THREE aspects of each and highlight the similarities and differences between studying at home and studying in a library. Also, state your preference and give reasons for it. Your article should be between 300 to 400 characters or longer. Use the desu/masu or da (plain) style, but use one style consistently. Also, use Kanji wherever Kanji from the AP Japanese Kanji list is appropriate. You have 20 minutes to write.
